1.name: Scratch
1.effect: Scratch the opponent with sharp claws.

2.name: Tackle
2.effect: Charge at the opponent with a full-body tackle.

3.name: Spare
3.effect: Attack the opponent in restrain to prevent the target from fainting. The target is left with at least 1 HP.

4.name: Quick Strike
4.effect: Lunges at the opponent quickly before the target can react. This move has a +1 priority.

5.name: Bite
5.effect: Bite the opponent with vicious fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Defense stat.

6.name: Tail Slap
6.effect: Slap the opponent with a tail. This move has a 10% chance of causing the target to flinch.

7.name: Horn Attack
7.effect: Jab at the opponent with a sharply pointed horn. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Attack stat.

8.name: Double Slap
8.effect: Slap the opponent twice in one turn.

9.name: Decisive Strike
9.effect: Look for an oponening and strike consistently. This move ignores the stat changes on the opponent.

10.name: Flurry Strike
10.effect: Strike the opponent in a flurry. Hit 2-5 times in one turn.

11.name: Flail
11.effect: Flail around and aimlessly attack. The less HP the user has, the greater the move's power.

12.name: Headbutt
12.effect: Recklessly headbutt the opponent that also hurt the user by a quarter of the damage dealt. This move also has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

13.name: Dizzy Punch
13.effect: Hit the opponent with a rhythmically punch. This move also has a 10% chance of leaving the target confused.

14.name: Crush Claw
14.effect: Slash the opponent with hard and sharp claws. This move also lowers the target's Defense stat.

15.name: Body Slam
15.effect: Crash into your opponent with a full-body tackle. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with paralysis.

16.name: Take Down
16.effect: Recklessly slam into the opponent but also hurt the user by a quarter of the damage dealt. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

17.name: Retaliate
17.effect: Revenge for a fainted ally. This move's power is doubled if one of the user's party members fainted last turn.

18.name: Rough Combat
18.effect: Fight the opponent up close with a rough style. This move lowers the user's Defense if used in succession.

19.name: Reckless Charge
19.effect: Recklessly rush and tackle the opponent. If this move lands and the opponent loses HP, the user also gets hurt by a third of the damage dealt.

20.name: Final Act
20.effect: Faint after using this move, even if there is no target.

21.name: Colossal Crash
21.effect: Charge at the opponent using every bit of its power. The user cannot move on the next turn.

22.name: Echo
22.effect: Attack the opponent with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by anyone on the field, its power is boosted.

23.name: Screech
23.effect: Attack the opponent with a screeching sound. This move also lowers the target's Defense stat.

24.name: Snore
24.effect: This move can only be used if the user is asleep. The harsh noise from it also has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

25.name: Ancient Hymn
25.effect: Sing an ancient song that shakes the opponent's heart. This move also has a 10% chance to induce sleep.

26.name: Weather Orb
26.effect: This move's type and power change depending on the weather. The move's type changes to ice during hail, water during rain, earth during sandstorm, fire during sunny day and the power doubles under any of these weather conditions.

27.name: Hidden Power
27.effect: Damage the opponent with a mysterious power. This move changes type to deal supereffective damage to the target.

28.name: Sonic Boom
28.effect: Release a destructive sound wave that shocks the opponent.

29.name: Outcry
29.effect: Attack in an uproar for 2 turns. During that time, no one can fall asleep, and those who are already asleep on the battle will be woken up.

30.name: Boomburst
30.effect: Attack everything around the user with the destructive power of explosive sound.

31.name: Super Nova
31.effect: Attack the opponent with a powerful and destructive blast. The user cannot move on the next turn.

32.name: Dodge
32.effect: Dodge upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

33.name: Guard
33.effect: Guard upcoming attack(s), but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

34.name: Rest
34.effect: Rest for 2 turns. Each turn restores the user's HP by 50% and Stamina by 25%. This move also removes all status condition.

35.name: Tickle
35.effect: Tickle the target into laughing, lowering its Special Defense stat.

36.name: Confide
36.effect: Tell the opponent a secret and make the target loses its ability to concentrate. This move lowers the target's Special Attack stat.

37.name: Constrict
37.effect: Use strategical position to restrict the moving space of the opponent. This move lowers the target's Speed stat.

38.name: Growl
38.effect: Let out a growl that lowers the opponent(s)' Attack stats.

39.name: Leer
39.effect: Give out an intimidating leer that lowers the opponent(s)' Defense stats.

40.name: Howl
40.effect: Howl to increase the spirit, raising the user's Attack stat.

41.name: Withdraw
41.effect: Withdraw into a hard shell, raising the user's Defense stat.

42.name: Accelerate
42.effect: Accelerate to boost the user's Speed stat.

43.name: Copycat
43.effect: Copy the move used immediately before the user. If no moves have been used, this move will fail.

44.name: Shield
44.effect: Create a shield to reduce damage from physical attacks for 5 turns.

45.name: Barrier
45.effect: Create a barrier to reduce damage from special attacks for 5 turns.

46.name: Muscle Up
46.effect: Tense the muscles to bulk up the body. This move raises the user's Attack stat and Defense stat.

47.name: Battle Dance
47.effect: Uplift the fighting spirit with a battle dance. This move boosts the user's Attack stat and Speed stat.

48.name: Rallying Cry
48.effect: Let out a powerful cry to uplift the spirit. This move sharply boosts the user's Attack stat.

49.name: Shell Break
49.effect: Break out of the shell to drastically raise the user's Speed stat, but lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense stats.

50.name: Endow
50.effect: Switch place with an ally in waiting and pass along any stat changes.

51.name: Bind
51.effect: Bind down the opponent to prevent the target from fleeing. The user also cannot switch.

52.name: Endure
52.effect: Survive any attack during this turn with at least 1 HP, but reduce success rate by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

53.name: Assist
53.effect: Assist an ally by boosting the power if that ally's attack in the same turn. This move has a +5 priority.

54.name: Roar
54.effect: Scare off the target, causing a different opponent to be dragged out.

55.name: Substitute
55.effect: Create a substitute using a quarter of HP. The substitute serves as the user's decoy.

56.name: Sing
56.effect: Sing a soothing lullbaby to put the opponent to sleep.

57.name: Recover
57.effect: Regenerate the cells to restore own HP by up to half of the max HP.

58.name: Refresh
58.effect: The user rests to cure itself of poisoning, burn, freeze or paralysis.

101.name: Leaf Blade
101.effect: Attack the opponent with a hardened leave.

102.name: Vine Whip
102.effect: Strike the opponent with a slender, whip-like vine to inflict damage.

103.name: Leaf Razor
103.effect: Attack the opponent with razor sharp leaves. This move has 10% critical hit chance.

104.name: Seed Pellets
104.effect: Attack the opponent by forcefully shooting seeds at the target. This move hits 2-5 times in a row.

105.name: Fury Cutter
105.effect: Slash the opponent with scythe-like attack. Consecutive success uses of this move increases the power by 5 each time (Max. 30).

106.name: Foliate
106.effect: Pelt the opponent with flower petals and leaves. This move also has a 10% chance of lowering the target's accuracy.

107.name: Forest Glide
107.effect: Glide through the forest to strike at the opponent. If the battle takes place in Forest Terrain, this move has +1 priority.

108.name: Thistle Slash
108.effect: Hack at the opponent with prickly stems. This move has a 20% chance of landing a critical hit.

109.name: Power Whip
109.effect: Violently whirl vines, tentacles or the like to lash the opponent. This move also has a 20% of causing the target to flinch.

110.name: Thorn Slam
110.effect: Slam the opponent with hard thorns to inflict heavy damage. This move also lowers the user's Attack stat.

111.name: Timber Whack
111.effect: Slam the opponent with hard rugged body to deal serious damage. If this move lands and the opponent loses HP, the user also gets hurt by a third of the damage dealt.

112.name: Pine Needles
112.effect: Shoot pine needles at the opponent.

113.name: Leaf Barrage
113.effect: Blast the target with sharp leaves. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

114.name: Enchanted Leaves
114.effect: Scatter enchanted leaves on the target. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Special Attack stat.

115.name: Grassy Blast
115.effect: Draw power from nature and blast at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance to cause the target to flinch.

116.name: Life Drain
116.effect: Drain the opponent's HP, and restore half of that to the user.

117.name: Vine Tangle
117.effect: Snare the opponent with a vine and trip it. The heavier the target, the greater the move's power.

118.name: Nature Force
118.effect: Use the power of nature to unlease a raging thrash to the surrounding area, hitting both foes and allies.

119.name: Solar Beam
119.effect: Gather light on the first turn, then blast a bundled beam on the next. This move does not need to charge on the first turn if the weather is sunny day. Power is halved if it's any other weather.

120.name: Bloom Doom
120.effect: Collect energy from plants and attack the opponent with full force. The user can't move on the next turn.

121.name: Photosynthesis
121.effect: Restore the user's HP by 25%. During harsh sunlight, this move restores 50% instead.

122.name: Sapping Seed
122.effect: Plant a seed on the opponent. It steals some HP from the target every turn.

123.name: Fungus Curse
123.effect: Cast a spell that curses the opponent, harshly lowering the target's Special Defense stat.

124.name: Snore Spore
124.effect: Put the opponent to sleep with a cloud of sleep-inducing spores.

125.name: Stun Spore
125.effect: Paralyse the opponent with a cloud of statically charged spores.

126.name: Toxic Spore
126.effect: Poison the opponent with a cloud of toxic infused spores.

127.name: Ingrain
127.effect: Lay roots that restore the user's own HP by 1/16 of the max HP every turn. The user can't switch out due to being rooted.

128.name: Wonder Herb
128.effect: Administer a special herb to both on and off the field allies and cleanse them off their status ailments.

199.name: Deadly Blossom
199.effect: Stab the opponent with the user's deadly tail. If the user successfully hits the target before it can move, the target will also be poisoned.

201.name: Spark
201.effect: Emit sparks of fire and strike at the opponent.

202.name: Incinerate
202.effect: Raze opponent with a fire attack. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

203.name: Flame Charge
203.effect: Charge at the opponent in a cloak of fire. Successful hit will raise the user's Attack stat.

204.name: Flame Flicker
204.effect: Charge at the opponent after cloaking in fire. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn. The user thaws out if it is frozen.

205.name: Fire Fang
205.effect: Bite the opponent with flame-cloaked fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Defense stat and 10% chance to leave a burn.

206.name: Fiery Claw
206.effect: Slash the opponent with a blazing claw. This move has a 10% chance of landing a critical hit and 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

207.name: Blaze Punch
207.effect: Punch the opponent with a flaming first. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

208.name: Flaming Kick
208.effect: Launch a flaming kick at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

209.name: Inferno Edge
209.effect: Focus bitter feelings toward the world of the lviing into a slashing attach. The user's HP is restored by up to half of the damage dealt to the target.

210.name: Wild Fire
210.effect: Trap the target inside a wild vortex of fire that inflicts damage for 3-5 turns.

211.name: Raging Flame
211.effect: The user ignites itself and charge at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of leaving the target with a burn but also hurts the user by a third of the damage dealt.

212.name: Sacred Fire
212.effect: Raze the opponent with a mystical fire of great intensity. This move has a 50% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

213.name: Fire Ball
213.effect: Blast a fire ball at the opponent.

214.name: Fire Breath
214.effect: Breathe out a wave of fire at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

215.name: Fire Blast
215.effect: Release a fiery blast at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

216.name: Heat Wave
216.effect: Exhale hot breath on the opposing field. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target(s) Special Defense stat.

217.name: Flame Burst
217.effect: Breath out bursting flame at the opponent. This move also deals half of the damage to the opponents next to the target as well.

218.name: Magma Storm
218.effect: Trap the opponent inside a maelstrom of fire that inflicts damage for 3-5 turns.

219.name: Eruption
219.effect: Release magma blasts into the surrounding area, dealing damage to both foes and allies.

220.name: Blue Flare
220.effect: Engulf the opponent in an intense, yet beautiful, blue flame. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Special Defense stat.

221.name: Scorching Fire
221.effect: Use all of the fire power to attack the opponent. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Special Attack stat.

222.name: Blast Burn
222.effect: Raze the opponent with an intense blast of all-consuming fire. The user can't move on the next turn.

223.name: Sun Dance
223.effect: Intensify the sun for 5 turns. The sunlight powers up Fire-type atacks and lowers the power of Water-type attacks.

224.name: Ignite
224.effect: Shoot a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

225.name: Combustion
225.effect: The user kindle its flames to raise both Special Attack and Special Defense stats.

226.name: Overheat
226.effect: The user gathers all the fire power to surpass its own limit. This move drastically raises the user's Special Attack stat but costs half of the user's max HP.

299.name: Ember Cutter
299.effect: The user ignites its sharp claws or fangs and slash at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat and 20% chance of leaving the target with a burn.

301.name: Plunge
301.effect: Plunge the opponent into the water.

302.name: Clamp
302.effect: Clamp and squeeze the opponent with a very thick and sturdy shell. This move prevents both the user and the opponent from switching out.

303.name: Aqua Jet
303.effect: Lunge at the target like a jet. This move deals double damage if the user is under the water.

304.name: Submerge
304.effect: Dive under the water and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Electric typed moves during this turn.

305.name: Geyser
305.effect: Slam into the opponent with full-force blast of water. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

306.name: Torrent Climb
306.effect: Hit the opponent with a blow packing the power of fish travelling up waterfalls.

307.name: Razor Shell
307.effect: Cut the opponent with sharp shell to inflict damage. This move has a 20% chance of reducing the target's Defense stat.

308.name: Tide Rush
308.effect: Swamp on a giant wave to strike the opponent.

309.name: Surging Strikes
309.effect: Strike the opponent with a flowing motion of water 3 times in a row. This move has a 100% critical hit chance.

310.name: Tidal Twister
310.effect: Trap the opponent inside a violent, swirling whirlpool that inflict damage for 3-5 turns.

311.name: Wave Crash
311.effect: Shroud in water and slam into the target with the whole body. This move hurts the user by a third of the damage dealt.

312.name: Water Gun
312.effect: Blast at the opponent with a shot of water.

313.name: Water Bomb
313.effect: Attack the opponent with a strong blast of water. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target in confusion.

314.name: Chilling Water
314.effect: Shower the opponent with chilling cold water. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target frozen.

315.name: Bubble Burst
315.effect: Splash the opponent with a giant water bubble. If targeting a foe, the harsh torrent will hurt them. If targeting an ally, cleansing water will soothe and heal them.

316.name: Maroon
316.effect: Wash the opponent(s) with an enourmous wave of water. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Attack stat.

317.name: Scald
317.effect: Shoot boiling water at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of leaving the target with a burn. This move also thaws the target.

318.name: Aqua Blast
318.effect: Summon a massive amount of water and blast it at the opponent in full force.

319.name: Tsunami
319.effect: Set off a tsunami that drowns everyone around the user, foes and allies.

320.name: Hydro Cannon
320.effect: Blast the opponent with a huge volume of water launched under great pressure. This move also has a 20% chance of flinching the target.

321.name: Origin Pulse
321.effect: Fire countless beams of brilliant blue water from the deep at the opponent. The user can't move on the next turn.

322.name: Rain Fall
322.effect: Summon a heavy rain that falls for 5 turns. The rain powers up Water-type moves by 50% and lowers the power of Fire-type moves by 50%.

323.name: Aqua Veil
323.effect: The user envelopes itself in a veil made of water. This move restores 1/16 of the user's max HP each turn.

324.name: Holy Water
324.effect: Scatter pure water around and restore the HP of the user and its ally on the field.

325.name: Drench
325.effect: Shoot a torrent of water that changes the target's type into Water for 3-5 turns.

399.name: Flowing Barrier
399.effect: Create a water barrier to surround the body, protecting the user from the next damaging move(s). If used successfully, this move recovers 1/8 of the user's HP. The success rate is reduced by 50% if used consecutively with any other evasion moves.

401.name: Zap
401.effect: Surround the body with electric and zap the opponent.

402.name: Tase
402.effect: Stun the opponent with a small jolt that always leaves the target with paralysis.

403.name: Thunder Fang
403.effect: Bite the opponent with electrified fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Defense stat and 10% chance to paralyse the target.

404.name: Thunder Claw
404.effect: Slash the opponent with an electrified claw. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with paralysis.

405.name: Thunder Punch
405.effect: Punch the opponent with an electrified first. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with paralysis.

406.name: Lightning Leap
406.effect: Leap at the opponent like a quick zap, then switch place with an ally waiting in party.

407.name: Lightning Strike
407.effect: Surrounding self with electricity and strike at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with paralysis.

408.name: Thunder Clap
408.effect: Throw down a giant thunderbolt. This move has a 20% chance of flinching the target.

409.name: Volt Tackle
409.effect: Electricfy yourself and recklessly charge into the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of leaving the target with paralysis but also hurts the user by a third of the damage dealt.

410.name: Giga Volt
410.effect: The user discharges all the electricity from its body to perform a high-damage attack. After using this move, the user will no longer be Electric type.

411.name: Jolt
411.effect: Attack the opponent with a jolt of electricity.

412.name: Shock Wave
412.effect: Strike the opponent with a wave of electricity. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with paralysis.

413.name: Power Surge
413.effect: Attack the opponent with an electric charge. The residual electricy raises the user's Special Attack stat.

414.name: Guided Bolt
414.effect: Zap the opponent with perfect accuracy. This move almost never misses.

415.name: Electro Cage
415.effect: Trap the opponent inside a cage of sparking electricity that inflicts damage for 3-5 turns.

416.name: Kinetic Burst
416.effect: Attack the opponent and draw out the target's power. This move regains 1/4 of the damage dealt as Stamina.

417.name: Lightning Bolt
417.effect: Summon a strong thunderbolt to strike at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with paralysis.

418.name: Discharge
418.effect: Strike everything around the user by letting loose a flare of electricity.

419.name: Thunder Storm
419.effect: Summon a great storm to strike at the opponent. This move has a 30% chance of leaving the target with paralysis. If the weather is Rainy Day, this move does not check accuracy, but if it's any Sunny Day, this move's accuracy is only 50%.

420.name: Plasma Burst
420.effect: Strike the opponent by focusing a high voltage of electricity in a single target. The recoil from this move harshly lowers the user's Special Attack stat.

421.name: Electrify
421.effect: Launch a weak jolt of electricity that paralyses the opponent.

422.name: Charge
422.effect: The user becomes charged, raising the user's Speed stat and doubles the power of the next Electric-type move it uses.

423.name: Energise
423.effect: Build up electric charge to raise the user's Special Attack and Special Defense stats.

424.name: Polarity Shift
424.effect: Manipulate magnetic energy that lowers the user's Speed stat, but drastically raises the user's Special Defense stat.

425.name: Eerie Impulse
425.effect: Generate an eerie impulse to expose the opponent. This move harshly lowers the target's Special Attack stat.

426.name: Magnetic Field
426.effect: Create a magnetic field that levitates both foes and allies on the field for 5 turns.

501.name: Scavenge
501.effect: Swoop down and strike the opponent. This move has a 25% chance of stealing the opponent's item.

502.name: Peck
502.effect: Jab the target with a sharply pointed beak.

503.name: Air Blade
503.effect: Attack the opponent with a blade of air.

504.name: Tailwind
504.effect: Whip up a turbulent whirlwind that boost the Speed stats of itself and its allies for 4 turns.

505.name: Aero Blast
505.effect: Attack the opponent with fierce wind. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target with confusion.

506.name: Cyclone
506.effect: Wrap the opponent in a powerful storm. This move will trap the opponent and deal 1/8 of the target's maximum HP per turn.

507.name: Hurricane
507.effect: Stir up a hurricane to attack the surrounding area, including foes and allies.

508.name: Sky Dive
508.effect: Plummet down onto the opponent below and crash into it. This move deals 25% recoil damage to the user.

509.name: Quick Feet
509.effect: Use faster footwork to raise the user's Evasion stat.

601.name: Sand Attack
601.effect: Hurl sand at the opponent to lower the target's Accuracy.

602.name: Burrow
602.effect: Burrow into the ground and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Earth typed moves during this turn.

603.name: Rock Fall
603.effect: Hurl large boulders at the opponent(s) to inflict damage. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

604.name: Ground Stomp
604.effect: Strongly stomp down on the ground to strike everything around the user, foes and allies. This move lowers the Speed stats of those hit.

605.name: Earthquake
605.effect: Set off an earthquake that strikes everyone around the user, foes and allies.

701.name: Iron Claw
701.effect: Slash the opponent with a harden claw. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

702.name: Iron Tail
702.effect: Slam the opponent with a steel-hard tail. This move has a 20% chance of reducing the target's Defense stat by one stage.

703.name: Power Ball
703.effect: Roll towards the opponent like a powerball. If it misses, the user is hurt instead for 25% of the maximum HP.

704.name: Heavy Bash
704.effect: Bash the target heavily with a harden body part. This move has a 20% chance of causing the target to flinch.

705.name: Heavy Slam
705.effect: Slam into the target with a heavy body. The more the user outweights the target, the greater the move's power.

706.name: Steel Crusher
706.effect: Crush the opponent with a force that can bend steel. This move has 20% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

707.name: Iron Wall
707.effect: Harden the body like an iron wall to sharply raise the user's Defense stat.

801.name: Frost Fang
801.effect: Bite the opponent with frosty fangs. This move has a 20% chance to reduce the target's Defense stat and 10% chance to freeze the target.

802.name: Frost Beam
802.effect: Shoot a beam of frosty ice at the opponent. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target frozen.

803.name: Ice Punch
803.effect: Punch the opponent with an icy first. This move has a 10% chance of leaving the target frozen.

901.name: Faint
901.effect: Attack the opponent and ignore evasion moves such as Dodge or Guard. It also lifts the effects of those moves.

11.name: Feint
11.effect: Quickly attack the opponent and make the target flinch. This move only works on the first turn each time the user enters battle.

13.name: Revenge
13.effect: Wait 2 turns then deal double the damage taken.

901.name: Pursuit
901.effect: Chase after the opponent and inflict double damage if the target switches out.

902.name: Shadow Claw
902.effect: Slash the opponent with a claw made from shadow. This move has a 10% critical hit chance.

903.name: Shadow Sneak
903.effect: Sneak in the dark and attack the next turn. The user becomes untargetable by all non-Light typed moves during this turn.

904.name: Phantom Force
904.effect: Surround the body with a swirl of dark energy then strike at the opponent. This move has 20% chance of lowering the target's Attack stat.

905.name: Glare
905.effect: Frighten the target with a scary face to lower the target's Speed stat.

906.name: Stalk
906.effect: Stalk the opponent, allowing the next move to have +1 priority and 50% critical hit chance.

22.name: Taunt
22.effect: The user draws attention to itself, making all opposing opponents take aim only at the user.

907.name: Provoke
907.effect: Taunt the opponent, causing the target to only be able to use attack moves for three turns.

22.name: Reprise
22.effect: For the next 3 turns, the target is forced to repeat its last move used.

22.name: Aurora Veil
22.effect: Create a protective veil that reduces the damage from physical and special moves for 5 turns.

22.name: Safe Haven
22.effect: Create a protective sanctuary that prevents status condition for 5 turns.

1101.name: Poison Tail
1101.effect: Hit the opponent with a poisonous tail. This move has a 10% chance of poisoning the target.
